description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Gaya Island, Malaysia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Five-Star Gaya Island Beachfront Hideaway off the Coast of Borneo
hotels.description: Located just off the coast of Borneo's Kota Kinabalu, Bungaraya Island Resort is a five-star secluded hideaway just steps from the white-sand beach of Gaya Islandâ€™s Polish Bay. Here, just 48 timber villas reflecting traditional Bornean architecture are nestled amid the lush greenery of a tropical jungle. Lounge by the sparkling infinity pool and take in views of the shimmering ocean beyond or visit the luxurious Echo Wellness Spa, where restorative treatments await. The alfresco The Longhouse Restaurant serves up traditional cuisine alongside a mix of local fare, while The Longhouse Wine Cellar is the perfect place to find your new favorite tipple.

seo.title: Hoteles en Gaya Island - Malaysia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Gaya Island, Malaysia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
